publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4021 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-4021 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon
